div.a: KPS Meetings of the Board of Trustees

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;

i.b: Due to the current COVID-19 directives from the Governor's office, in conjunction with the Centers For Disease Control, to practice social distancing, all meetings of Kalispell Public Schools Board of Trustees will be conducted through teleconferencing for the foreseeable future. Please click 'view more' for more information

em.span: Your K-5 staff has been working diligently to provide you with meaningful learning content. Check back daily for updated content!

strong.span: Click on Image to see PDF of our Mission/Purpose - Beliefs & Goals

span.strong: Check out our New 2019 Performance Report

p.strong: **Please note that the 2019 Performance Report contains Graphic Based Information that is not reader accessible. Please call Beth Kornick at our district office 406-751-3434 to have any of the non-accessible content explained.

img.alt: Photo link for KPS 2019 annual report

strong.span: Click on Image to be Redirected to the Report

hr.p: Adobe Reader Disclaimer: Adobe Acrobat Reader is required to view PDF files. This is a free program available from the Adobe website. Follow the download directions on the Adobe web site to get your copy of Adobe Acrobat Reader. You must have the latest version of Adobe Reader on your computer to fully utilize all the forms on this site. Failure to use the latest version of Adobe Reader may lead to errors on the form, and difficulties when correcting items on the form. Free Adobe Reader Download
